work.work-title: Hark, the Glad Sound! The Savior Comes

identification.rights: This hymn is in the public domain. You may freely use this score for personal and congregational worship. If you reproduce the score, please credit Hymnary.org as the source.

credit.credit-words: Hark, the Glad Sound! The Savior Comes
This hymn is in the public domain. You may freely use this score for personal and congregational worship. If you reproduce the score, please credit Hymnary.org as the source.
Text: Philip Doddridge, 1735; based on Isaiah 61:1-2 Tune: Thomas Haweis, 1792; adapt. Samuel Webbe, 1808
